explanation: The program read the two lines including spaces (e.g. "R G B") so indexing compared spaces and letters, producing wrong mismatch counts and incorrect rotation checks. I fixed this by replacing the second input line with a single line that reads t and then removes spaces from both s and t (so both become compact three-character strings like "RGB"). This preserves the rest of the logic (including the rotation check using "t in s+s").
